user.title: Connect to ADS Device
user.description: Set up your ADS (Automation Device Specification) connection.

data_description.adsvar_position: For covers: The PLC variable for position feedback

data_description.adsvar_open: For covers: The PLC variable to trigger open

data_description.options: For select: Comma-separated list of options (e.g., Option1,Option2,Option3)

list_entities.title: Manage Entities
